title: Boris On Probation (with Vernon Bogdanor)
itunes:title: Boris On Probation (with Vernon Bogdanor)
description:
The new government has only been loaned votes by traditional Labour voters, who have put Johnson's administration on probation to see if it will keep its promises to them. Vernon Bogdanor, Research Professor at the Institute for Contemporary British History at King's College London speaks to Bloomberg Westminster's Roger Hearing and Caroline Hepker about Brexit, anti-semitism and the need for a written constitution.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
